data.title: Google Maps helps Italian police capture mafia fugitive
data.description: Italian police has caught a top mafia fugitive who had been on the run for nearly 20 years thanks to the help of the Google Maps app, an investigator told Reuters on Wednesday.

data.title: Roku tumbles 12% after analyst says competition from Amazon, Google is stunting user growth
data.description: Roku shares dropped 12% on Wednesday, falling to their lowest price since October 2020.

data.title: Warren, Jayapal blast Google over efforts to "bully" and "sideline" DOJ's top antitrust official
data.description: Google must stop attempting to intimidate US antitrust enforcers at the Justice Department, according to two congressional Democrats.

data.title: Sen. Warren and Rep. Jayapal tell Google to stop trying to 'bully' DOJ antitrust chief into recusal
data.description: Google previously requested the DOJ review whether Kanter should be recused from cases and investigations involving its business based on his past work.

data.title: Macy's shortens store hours as COVID-19 cases surge
data.description: Macy's Inc will reduce its US store hours for the rest of January as it prepares for potential COVID-19 cases among workers with the Omicron variant driving up infections across the United States.

data.title: Where to travel 2022: The best destinations to go
data.description: Travel is more challenging now than it has been in a long time. Borders tentatively reopen only to slam shut again. A once-simple visa on entry is replaced with piles of paperwork. And the whole world is brushing up on the Greek alphabet whenever a new variant makes headlines.
